playgroundMap.title: Playground Map
playgroundMap.description: Discover playgrounds and their popularity in your area
playgroundMap.heatmapExplanation: The playground heatmap shows areas with high concentrations of playgrounds. Red areas indicate more playgrounds close together, while blue areas have fewer playgrounds.
playgroundMap.heatmapUsage: Use this map to find areas with many playgrounds, which are ideal for planning playdates with multiple options nearby.
playgroundMap.tip1: Look for playgrounds in red areas for more options in close proximity
playgroundMap.tip2: Click on a playground marker to see details and get directions
playgroundMap.tip3: Use your current location to find playgrounds near you
playgroundMap.tip4: Arrange playdates at playgrounds with multiple options nearby in case one is too crowded
playgroundMap.addPlaygroundInstructions: Click on the map to add a new playground
playgroundMap.addPlaygroundTip: Select the exact location of the playground on the map
playgroundMap.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g. Playground with swings, slides, and climbing area
playgroundMap.featuresHelp: Select all features available at this playground
playgroundMap.uploadImageHelp: Upload a photo of the playground (Optional)
playgroundMap.addSuccessMessage: Thank you for contributing to our community playground map!
playgroundMap.addErrorMessage: There was an error adding the playground. Please try again.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Data protection and privacy settings
privacy.dataPrivacyDesc: Your data is stored securely and never shared without permission.
privacy.chatHistoryDesc: Messages are automatically deleted after 7 days.
privacy.locationDataDesc: Location data is only used for finding nearby places.
privacy.exportSuccessDesc: Your data has been downloaded successfully.
privacy.exportErrorDesc: Unable to export your data. Please try again.
privacy.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Permanently delete your PaPa-Hi account and all associated data
deleteAccount.warningTitle: Warning: This Action Cannot Be Undone
deleteAccount.warningDesc1: Deleting your account will permanently remove:
deleteAccount.warning2: All playdates you created or joined
deleteAccount.warning3: Places you added to the platform
deleteAccount.exportDesc: Before deleting your account, you can download a copy of all your data for your records.
deleteAccount.deleteDesc: To confirm account deletion, type "DELETE" in the field below.
deleteAccount.confirmErrorDesc: Please type "DELETE" to confirm account deletion.
deleteAccount.successDesc: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.errorDesc: Unable to delete your account. Please contact support for assistance.
deleteAccount.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to delete your account.
deleteAccount.exportSuccessDesc: Your data has been downloaded. You can now proceed with account deletion if desired.
deleteAccount.exportErrorDesc: Unable to export your data. Please try again.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introText: PaPa-Hi ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our family social networking platform.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, or communicate with other users.
privacyPolicy.personalInfoItems: Name, email address, profile photo, bio, city, and children's information (names and ages)
privacyPolicy.usageDataItems: Information about how you use our service, including playdates created, places visited, and app interactions
privacyPolicy.locationDataItems: Approximate location to help you find nearby places and connect with local families
privacyPolicy.dataUseText: We use your information to provide and improve our services, including:
privacyPolicy.dataUseItems: Connecting you with other families, Suggesting nearby places and activities, Organizing playdates, Sending relevant notifications, Improving our platform
privacyPolicy.dataSharingText: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties except:
privacyPolicy.dataSharingItems: With your explicit consent, To comply with legal obligations, To protect our rights and safety
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. Chat messages are automatically deleted after 7 days.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsText: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
privacyPolicy.rightsItems: Access your personal data, Correct inaccurate information, Delete your account and data, Export your data, Withdraw consent
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: We use essential cookies to provide our service. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
privacyPolicy.contactText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at papa@papa-hi.com.

help.title: Help & Support
help.subtitle: Help and frequently asked questions
help.gettingStartedDesc: Learn how to make the most of PaPa-Hi.
help.faqDesc: Find answers to frequently asked questions.
help.contactSupportDesc: Get in touch with our support team.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.accountDesc: Retained while your account is active and for 2 years after deletion for legal compliance
retention.locationDesc: Processed in real-time and not stored unless you save specific places
retention.analyticsDesc: Aggregated and anonymized data retained for 26 months
retention.chatDesc: Messages are automatically deleted after 7 days for privacy protection
